mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_name) values(#{member.me_id}, #{member.me_pw}, #{member.me_email}, #{member.me_name})
mapper.select: select * from post where po_bo_num = #{bo_num} order by po_num desc limit #{postListNum},5
mapper.insert: insert into post(po_content, po_title, po_me_id, po_bo_num, po_me_name) values(#{post.po_content}, #{post.po_title}, #{post.po_me_id}, #{post.po_bo_num}, #{post.po_me_name})
insert into comment(co_content, co_po_num, co_me_id) values(#{comment.co_content}, #{comment.co_po_num}, #{comment.co_me_id})
mapper.delete: delete from post where po_bo_num=(select bo_num from board where bo_ca_title=#{ca_title}and bo_title=#{bo_title}and po_title=#{po_title});
mapper.update: update post set po_content=#{post.po_content}where(select bo_num from board where bo_ca_title=#{ca_title}and bo_title=#{bo_title}and po_title=#{post.po_title});
mapper.delete: delete from comment where co_po_num = (select co_po_num from post join board on po_bo_num = bo_num where bo_ca_title = #{ca_title} and bo_title = #{bo_title} and po_title = #{po_title}and co_num = #{co_num})
